segments.text: I see the boy balancing on that stool, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s going to fall any second now, and it’s going to be bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is already wobbling, and he’s not even paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl is just standing there, not helping at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve ever thought about what could happen if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is getting closer, and it’s going to make the floor even more dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the mom is completely unaware of what’s going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the cookies that he doesn’t see how close he is to falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the girl at least tries to steady him before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
